acdecom.WaveGuide.set_flip_flow¶

WaveGuide.set_flip_flow(self, flip_flow)¶

Set the flow direction. Standard flow direction is in \(P_+\) direction.

Parameters

flip_flow (bool) – If flip_flow is True, the flow direction is in \(P_-\) direction (towards the test component).

acdecom.WaveGuide.set_distance

Next topic
